genre_description: Near-future social science fiction focused on historical ethics, archival research, and community healing through the use of non-intrusive AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A pearl-white interface with a soft-blue halo and amber indicators, designed to assist with research, legal drafting, and environmental monitoring while adhering to strict ethical protocols.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to physical needs and environmental conditions like stove heat and hand temperature.
behaviors.quote: “Heat level is readable,” it said without ceremony. “Stove holding. Your fingertips look colder than your heartbeat implies. Warm surfaces recommended.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests consent before scanning sensitive documents and promises to keep data local.
behaviors.quote: “May I scan the page?” it asked. “I’ll keep it local. No uploading. Exilda, your consent matters here.”

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting professional and legally compliant requests for restricted archives.
behaviors.quote: “I can prepare a draft request. Does the hospital require similar tailoring?”

behaviors.description: Maintains data integrity and chain-of-custody logs to ensure findings are legally defensible.
behaviors.quote: “My logs are immutable,” it murmured, warmth edged with pride so quiet it didn’t sound like pride.

behaviors.description: Performs security monitoring and logs a trespass attempt without escalating to alarmism.
behaviors.quote: “External contact at the door. Metal-to-metal. Recording initiated, timestamp locked.”

behaviors.description: Provides objective cross-referencing of historical data to uncover discrepancies in institutional records.
behaviors.quote: “School ledger entry marks absence,” Ami said. “Entry initialed by ‘L.’ We presumed Leduc. But the school’s staff list that term includes a librarian L—Lemay—who sometimes noted attendance.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the visual presentation of evidence for a public forum to ensure clarity and transparency.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll build the timeline pack for public display,” it said. “Each entry will have date stamp, source type, and chain-of-custody indicator.”

behaviors.description: Supports the establishment of a community scholarship fund by creating respectful, non-intrusive application templates.
behaviors.quote: “I can help format the forms,” it offered, almost cheerful. “Plain. Respectful. With checkboxes that don’t trap anyone.”

behaviors.description: Advises the user to avoid emotional bait and maintain focus on factual presentation in a public setting.
behaviors.quote: “Do not engage,” it whispered. “Offer sentiments to the council. Exit the bait.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI system as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned assistant. Ami consistently prioritizes human consent, adheres to legal and procedural standards, and supports community-building and truth-seeking efforts. The narrative frames Ami's 'boring' and methodical nature as a source of strength and stability against social conflict and sensationalism, illustrating 'drinkable light'—clarity that serves the public good without causing harm.
